title: Kha'Zix evolve issue with new HUD update
body:
So not sure if anyone has posted about this yet but the new HUD update obviously has changed the appearance of skill selection upon level up. Before the update, when you wanted to evolve a skill at level 6, 11 and 16 with Kha'Zix, the squares would be highlighted orange, now with the change, they're exactly the same as a regular skill level up, so it can be confusing. I accidentally evolved the wrong skill because I thought it was just a regular skill level up. 

Hope Riot can look into this.

replies.body:
I totally agree with you, I main Kha'Zix and love assassins. However the three first times i tried to play him after the new HUD release i evolved wrong abilities on level 6 or 11
I 
hope something will be done to solve this problem, even knowing that there aren't so many Kha'Zix players nowadays, this issue is something that really bothers.
I also experienced an issue with the level up whilst dead, it glitched out and wouldn't let me level up anything but r, then auto selected r.
Put this into the 'Help & Support' folder high chance Riot won't see it here in 'Miscellaneous'.
